scripts.check: npm run -s lint && npm run -s test
scripts.clean: npm run -s clean:backend && npm run -s clean:admin
scripts.clean:backend: npm run -s clean:backend:cache && php bin/console cache:clear -e dev
scripts.db:fixture: php bin/console doctrine:database:drop -e dev --force --if-exists && sleep 2 && npm run -s db:migrate && php bin/console doctrine:fixtures:load -e dev -n
scripts.db:migrate: npm run -s db:create && php bin/console doctrine:migrations:migrate --no-interaction --allow-no-migration
scripts.dist: node scripts/repeka.js && node scripts/version-public.js && node scripts/assert-prod.js && (npm run dist:backend && npm run dist:admin) && php bin/console statsd:deploy
scripts.dist:backend: composer-runner -- install --optimize-autoloader --no-dev && npm run -s clean:backend:cache && php bin/console cache:clear -e prod --no-debug && npm run -s db:migrate
scripts.install: node scripts/repeka.js && node scripts/version-public.js && (composer-runner -- install && npm run -s db:migrate && cd src/AdminPanel && npm install)
scripts.lint: rm -fr var/reports/lints/*.xml && (npm run -s lint:backend && npm run -s lint:admin)
scripts.lint:backend: rm -fr var/reports/phpmd/*.xml && (npm run -s lint:backend:phpmd && npm run -s lint:backend:phpcs)
scripts.test: npm run -s test:backend && npm run -s test:admin
scripts.test:backend: npm run -s test:backend:unit && npm run -s test:backend:integration
scripts.test:backend:junit: sh -c "vendor/bin/phpunit -c scripts --fail-on-warning --testdox --log-junit var/reports/tests/phpunit.xml --coverage-clover var/reports/coverage/phpunit.xml && vendor/bin/phpunit -c scripts/phpunit_integration.xml --fail-on-warning --testdox --log-junit var/reports/tests/phpunit_integration.xml"
scripts.test:junit: rm -f var/reports/tests/*.xml var/reports/coverage/*.xml && npm run -s test:backend:junit && cd src/AdminPanel && npm run -s test:junit
scripts.watch: npm run -s clean && cd src/AdminPanel && npm run -s watch
